entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Nain
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:31 PM ADT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snowshower, -9.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Nain Airport 5:00 PM ADT Sunday 19 March 2023
Condition: Light Snowshower
Temperature: -9.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -14.2°C
Wind: NW 22 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 cm except 10 cm in the Natuashish area. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 early this evening then becoming northwest 50 gusting to 80 near midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM ADT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm except 10 cm in the Natuashish area. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 80. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:30 PM ADT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 cm in the Natuashish area. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 4:30 PM ADT Sunday 19 March 2023
